price: Likewise, no messenger came to those before them without being told: “A magician, or a madman!”
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ مَآ أَتَى ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا قَالُواْ سَاحِرٌ أَوۡ مَجۡنُونٌ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
